sentences.sContent: The study indicates a connection between poverty and crime.
sentences.sCn: 研究显示贫穷和犯罪有关联。

...Small signs may indicate great changes to come and therefore merit attention...
...but new data from the Census Bureau indicate that mobility has reached its lowest level in recorded history...

...student are not asked to indicate race when applying for housing...
...there is evidence to indicate that natural surroundings improve all kinds of things...
